title: POtHS - End Times - 87 - Countdown to Armageddon
description:
Countdown to Armageddon:
This newly updated documentary is blended together by British narrator Simon Peterson and contains highly informative and thought-provoking audio-visual material that you will not want to miss! Discover what earthshaking events are soon to take place, so you can plan your future. Countdown to Armageddon shows how the New World Order, microprocessor technology, a universal credit system, and other current developments were accurately foretold thousands of years ago.

Don't forget to watch part two of this documentary series called "Beyond Armageddon".
To purchase this DVD, visit: http://audiobiblekjv.org/ppcta.html
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Beyond Armageddon:
A compelling documentary: "Beyond Armageddon" brings to your screen documentation of fulfilled predictions, the soon to come battle of Armageddon, and visions of the promised golden age. Join host Simon Peterson on a journey through Israel as he explores the many intricate details of Bible Prophecy and its imminent fulfillment within our generation. "Exploring future events foretold in the ancient scriptures."
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Giants, Revealing the Agenda of the Fallen Cherub:
Discovery the hidden history of Giants living in the world as described in the bible.  Learn of the three main tribes of Giants and how they've existed over time and more about the demonic agenda.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

L.A. Marzulli - The Biblical Giants:
Gary Stearman and L.A. Marzulli discuss the biblical accounts of the nephilim. <a href="
http://www.prophecywatchers.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.prophecywatchers.com</a>
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Russ Dizdar - The Coming Chaos; An Update on the Black Awakening:
Russ Dizdar speaks about the spiritual warfare that is taking place today and future expectations.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Satan's New World Order:
A FULL LENGTH FEATURE FILM presenting the modern call for peace, peace, peace, the Nuclear Missile Threat, One World Government, the Nazis and Joe Biden and many other global leaders.

Through FEAR, they hold a gun to our heads demanding if we want PEACE then we have to put an end to our own nationhood and country because of the threat of nuclear war or nuclear annihilation and planetary changes like climate change. They tell us resistance is futile and that we must join the NEW world order under control of THEIR global government and that's exactly what we're letting them do, DEFEAT us without one shot fired and without even defending ourselves.

Who is behind it? The prince of this world; Satan.
That's not to say that our current governments are GOOD. But it is saying that the coming world government will be consolidated down into one centralized control mechanism that will make it much easier to literally control the entire world, which is what the antichrist will do. And to be perfectly candid with you, we are already under complete control of world government and that the only thing left of our national governments is an empty husk, a remenant simply leftover for appearance's sake that allows the populace to believe everything is still ok.

Can we really Stop Globalization"?  The answer is No! The Bible says we can not stop what is coming, but it also says we Christians are the salt of the earth and that we should stand against the wiles of the devil. Not just go along with it willingly.  This is a battle and we must Warn Everyone. Show others these facts and lead them to the Bible, the King James Version.

Stop Globalization. Stand against the wiles of the devil. Put on the whole armor of God. Let's not just sit back and say we are defeated before we begin. Don't make it EASY for Satan! Submit to God and don't worry about what the devil is doing.

James 4 verse 7 says,
"Submit yourselves therefore to God.
Resist the devil, and he will flee from you."

That's God's PROMISE to you. Ignore Satan and pay close attention to God and HIS instructions and submit to God, not the devil, and the devil *WILL* flee from you. Not just a maybe.
God bless you all :)
~Jeff The watchman

"the interview" includes the following ...
Joe Biden,the interview,obama,bush,bill clinton,hillary,cronkite,world federalist,global governence,award,traitor,treason,world government, one world, one world order,antichrist,follow Jesus, follow your heart debunked!, the world says follow your heart, God says follow Him!
Warn everyone. Open your Bibles and begin studying it now!
------------------------------------------------------------------------

An Epidemic of Demonic Possession:
This video documents various instances of demonic possession in the first half of 2014. This is something that will increase in the times to come. In the last few years we've seen a sharp increase in what the media dubs "zombie" and "cannibal" attacks. Or is it possibly a clever set of "code words" to cover up something MUCH more sinister? Let's explore!
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Signs - Part 75:
A folder series compiled of various short clips presenting recent apocalyptic signs occurring around the world today to help us identify the state of affairs ushering the end of days.  View what's been happening in our time and descern for yourself the onset of Revelations and what still may lay ahead before the comming of our Lord.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
